channel.title: John Swinney on The Majority
channel.description: Recent content in John Swinney on The Majority

item.title: Independence Is Dead
item.description: This week, John Swinney launched yet another desperate push to try to break up the UK, this time fronted by a glossy poster declaring: “Scotland is a nation. We affirm that every nation has the right to choose its own future. We choose a future where Scotland decides its own government…This is our plea, our right, and our opportunity: To place who live here at the heart of our national opportunity: democracy.
